website_summaries.verdict: Skip this cooker -- unless you're really into risotto.
pros: The $70 Black+Decker 6-in-1 Stirring Cooker has an automated arm that stirs risotto for you
cons: The cooker does a lousy job at just about every other task

customer_reviews.title: "Perfect rice every time" - husband
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband as an anniversary gift and he loves it more than any other kitchen appliance. He's a cook by the way so I think that says something when an already great cook loves an appliance.
customer_reviews.author: Mariah

customer_reviews.author: Lulup

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing. Definitely a wonderful device for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing. Definitely a wonderful device for the price. I bought this for my mother as a gift, and she literally uses it EVERY day. She loves it. Easy to use, and it only took her two tries to get the rice the perfect texture (she put a little more water than is recommended--not too much more).
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Tome

customer_reviews.title: Stop working and smell burn
customer_reviews.text: I'm trying to get in touch with the black and decker guys here in NYC and they haven't answered my calls. My pot stop working and smell burn, they have a phone number in the box but they don't return calls. Anybody can help me with this???
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Space Saving Multi-Cooker
customer_reviews.text: I was getting tired of my kitchen looking increasingly cluttered by various cooking devices. I got this multicooker hoping to pair down from having both a rice cooker, steamer and slow cooker. I've also realized that I can probably get rid of my electric fondue pot because this should do the job nicely as well. The pasta cooking feature and risotto making feature I'll probably never use, but it is nice for making soups and rice. My one complaint is that the slow cooker can only cook on high and has no low feature. If that's a deal breaker for you, then you should look into some of the other multi-cookers.
customer_reviews.author: Laura I

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: As a general purpose rice cooker, this is great. It does the job at least as well as other rice cookers I have tried, if not better. I suspected that the risotto-making feature was too good to be true, and unfortunately that seems to be the case. Your mileage may vary, but I find there really isn't any mechanical substitute for the tedious process of just standing over the stove and stirring, stirring, stirring and adding the broth a bit at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Nero Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Great Kitchen Machine!
customer_reviews.text: I am really happy with this all in one cooker. As a rice cooker, I love it, but I also appreciate the fact that I can easily use this as a crock pot and a steamer. This is a really versatile machine that will allow you to do many things in the kitchen without having to use numerous devices. Also, the capacity is great! It's perfect for family cooking.
customer_reviews.author: musiclover13

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile - good value
customer_reviews.text: I am glad to add this cooker to my collection of Black and Decker products. It is easy to use, and the multi-functional capacity is useful and convenient. I consider it to be a very good value. My only complaint is the same as it was for my crock pot - the pots are not stainless steel, as the exterior is. That is my favoured material for anything - the more since I dropped and broke the ceramic bowl of the original crock pot.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth G Melillo

customer_reviews.title: Replaces five appliances
customer_reviews.text: This can do pretty much anything my other five appliances do and it does all of them sell. It makes a large or small quantity and works very well.
customer_reviews.author: AKN

customer_reviews.title: This is decent but wish it was larger
customer_reviews.text: This is great for consolidating your cookware in a small kitchen. It's versatile and does everything it's supposed to do, and does it well. The problem for me is that we use a slow cooker for making bone broth with chicken, but this is much too small to get a whole chicken into it. It also only slow cooks on a high setting. So this won't be replacing our other slow cooker. Regardless it's large enough for everything else we want to do, since we're cooking for two. It's light and fairly compact which makes it easy to store and use. The only other downside is that it's aluminum and for health purposes I'd prefer stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Ashley

product_meta.title: BLACK+DECKER RCR520S All-in-One Cooking Pot, 20-Cup Cooked/10-Cup Uncooked Rice Cooker, Slow Cooker and Food Steamer with Saute Function, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description:
Color:All in One Stainless Steel

“Multi-Function” is the name of the game for the BLACK+DECKER All-In-One Cooking Pot and Rice Cooker. Preset functions give you options to cook rice, risotto, and pasta, and to slow cook, sauté, and keep food warm. A specially designed stirring function lets you create creamy, authentic risotto and does all the work for you. The nonstick pasta basket lets you use the cooking pot as a pasta cooker or a food steamer. Update your kitchen with the versatility and convenience of BLACK+DECKER.

Accessories Included
The included rice measure matches up with markings in the cooking pot for the perfect rice-to-liquid ratio and perfectly fluffy rice without the guesswork. Plus, you get a dishwasher-safe serving spoon that’s safe to use on the nonstick cooking surface.

Dishwasher-Safe
The removable cooking pot, pasta/steaming basket, stirring arm, and glass lid, are all dishwasher-safe for easy cleanup.
feature_bullets: Six Preset Functions - This multi-function appliance has presets for: rice, risotto, pasta, slow cook, sauté, and keep warm. 20 Cups Cooked Rice - The large capacity cooking pot yields up to 20 cups of cooked rice (10 cups, uncooked) for full, family-sized portions
Sauté Function - One-pot cooking for soups, stews, and more! This stovetop feature lets you sauté proteins and vegetables or put the finishing touch on homemade sauces
Stirring Function - Make creamy, authentic risotto without the hassle! The detachable stirring arm rotates during cooking for fast, consistent results

Nonstick Cooking Pot And Pasta/Steam Basket - Easy cleanup with the nonstick-coated cooking pot. Plus, use the nonstick metal basket to quickly boil pasta or use it as a food steaming basket for perfectly cooked veggies and proteins
Auto Keep Warm - Once rice is done cooking and ready to serve, the machine automatically switches to the “Keep Warm” function for perfect rice every time
